Paragraph.Text: The Electric Light must be connected to power to operate and provides a cool blue light across a far wider area than a standard Torch. These are expressely designed to light up cavernous areas. You can use the Paintgun (B) to tint or darken the lights as necessary.
Three styles of projection are available: Spotlight, Pointlight and Shadowed Pointlight. Do not enable Shadows unless you're on a powerful computer.
